education.summary: Specializing in Motion Planning and Controls, advised by Dr. Beh¸cet A¸cikme¸se

education.institution: Birla Institute of Technology, Mesra, IND
courses: Vehicle Dynamics, Finite Element Method, Data Structures & Algorithms

work.name: Autonomous Controls Lab
highlights: Perception aware trajectory planning for coverage: Developed and implemented 6DOF quad-rotor trajectory planning using Sequential Convex Programming with pointing constraints

Formulated minimum viewpoint problem as a Mixed Integer Optimization problem and created a view planning package(C++, Python) for 3D object reconstruction using Point Cloud Library(PCL) with object-oriented design
Maintaining Trajectory Optimization software library for live flight demonstrations with quad-rotor(C++)
Developing next generation of drone hardware and software stack to support perception and onboard trajectory computing tasks

work.name: Monarch Tractor
highlights: Conducted system identification of an Electro-Hydraulic Steering Actuator and designed a feedforward steering controller, improving the steering response by 100 ms
Developed a steering simulator to design and test various control strategies

work.name: TATA Motors Ltd.
highlights: Led Cross-Functional Team for Gearbox and Engine Cooling System of Euro 6 vehicles and identified cost reduction opportunities through DFMA, cost-driver analysis, Linear Performance Pricing, and VAVE resulting in potential savings of $2 million for commercial and passenger vehicles

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'

publications.name: Design of a formula Sae chassis according to lateral load transfer distribution
publications.publisher: International Journal of Research in Engineering and Technology

projects.name: Reinforcement Learning for Flying Insect Robots
highlights: Implemented the Proximal Policy optimization method in AirSim (Microsoft Simulator) to train a quad-rotor equipped with cameras to autonomously navigate the corridor without colliding

projects.name: Manipulating Images Using Autoencoders
highlights: Developed and trained a Convolutional Autoencoder to denoise an image for classification(MNIST Dataset) using Pytorch achieving a minimum classification accuracy of 76.5% at a noise factor of 0.9(Gaussian noise)

projects.name: Design Optimisation of a Car Underbody Diffuser for obtaining Maximum Downforce(Undergraduate Thesis)
highlights: Designed an underbody diffuser for a Formula Student car using Solidworks and performed CFD analysis using ANSYS Fluent to optimize the diffuser geometry for maximum downforce
